text:
Anurag Kashyap Is Reuniting With Taapsee For A Supernatural Movie, Says She Is A Woman With A Mission
Anurag Kashyap Is Reuniting With Taapsee For A Supernatural Movie, Says She Is A Woman With A Mission
After their collaboration for Manmarziyaan, director Anurag Kashyap is reuniting with Taapsee Pannu for a supernatural thriller.
Twitter
According to reports, the untitled film will go on floors by the end of this year and will hit the theaters in 2020. Anurag Kashyap confirmed the news and speaking to a leading daily, he said,
Twitter
"Taapsee keeps me on my toes and is on a mission to make me take on challenges. I have never done anything like this before, so I am looking forward to it."
Talking about the same, Taapsee added that she always knew that she would be collaborating with him soon.
IT’S OFFICIAL... Taapsee Pannu and director Anurag Kashyap reunite [after #Manmarziyaan] for a supernatural thriller... Not titled yet... Produced by Sunir Kheterpal [who just produced #Badla]... Will be filmed in a start-to-finish schedule in Nov-Dec 2019... Summer 2020 release. — taran adarsh (@taran_adarsh) March 12, 2019
However, she added that she wasn't sure that it'd happen this soon. She added,
Twitter
Don't Miss 555 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES
"We had been discussing stories and this one received a resounding yes’ from everyone. I am looking forward to it as I have not explored the supernatural genre in Hindi films yet."
The film will be produced by Sunir Kheterpal.
title: Anurag Kashyap Is Reuniting With Taapsee For A Supernatural Movie, Says She Is A Woman With A Mission
description: Anurag said, "Taapsee keeps me on my toes and is on a mission to make me take on challenges. I have never done anything like this before, so I am looking forward to it."After a successful collaboration for Manmarziyaan, director Anurag Kashyap is reuniting with Taapsee Pannu for a supernatural thriller.
